attributes.action: Jedward (john and edward grimes) may be losing there record deal but us as there fans do not want this to happen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: us as jedward fans (the twins from the xfactor) do not want to see them get dropped from there record company we love of how entertaining jedward are and we love there voices they are amazing and i want to get this petition started to stop them from loosing there record deal

rejection.details: This is not a matter with which this Office can assist or comment on.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
